name: Dream Doll House Design Games
description:
Welcome to my Dream Doll House Design Game 2019. In this Dream Doll House decoration game you can design your house. Select a room from your Doll House i.e Bedroom, Washroom, Living Room or Kitchen and design it with cutest element. Now it's on you that how you can decorate your house as there is lot of combinations. Show all your designing skill in this Decoration game. When you design a room then you can save that combination in your device and also you can save that combination in your game. In this new doll house designing game you can also decorate your doll. Made a unique doll by selecting the cutest elements such as fashionable dress, hairs, valuable shoes and attractive eyes. Enjoy the doll games with new fashion styles.

Features:
- Design your dream doll house.
- Decorate your baby doll bedroom.
- Decorate a unique kitchen for your dream doll.
- Decorate a valuable Washroom for your baby doll.
- Create an attractive baby doll for your dream house.
